hero.title: Break Language Barriers Instantly!
hero.subtitle: Translate Egyptian Arabic to English with AI-powered accuracy

aiAccuracy.title: AI-Powered Accuracy
aiAccuracy.description: The translation engine is trained on large datasets to ensure accurate translations between Egyptian Arabic and English.

textToSpeech.title: Text-to-Speech Support
textToSpeech.description: Users can listen to both the input text and the translated output using AI-powered speech synthesis, helping with pronunciation and learning.
